title: Images pour Bach
brief_description: A series of abstract shapes and patterns are shown in synchronisation with two Bach compositions - Overture from the Suite for Orchestra No 5 in F major and Invention No 14 in D major are rearranged in modern electronic fashion. Colour and shape recur and vary according to the themes and variations in the musical structure.
